channel.title: maven-test-skip on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in maven-test-skip on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Tip: Differences in maven test execution
item.description: There are times when you only want to have the production code: downstream job after a successful build compiling in local after checkout from DVCS spiking (possibly the tests are broken) speeding up the process For that, maven allows to skip the tests, selectively: -DskipTests compiles the tests, but skips running them -Dmaven.test.skip skips compiling the tests and does not run them. This can also be written as -Dmaven.
